TopicTitle: Has there been any talk about being able to switch to first person as a kerbal during EVA?

Articles.Content: I was playing KSP1 earlier and got to thinking about it. In my opinion it would be great for fixing things on outposts (like in the current KSP), exploring and just all around immersion.  Have you guys heard anything and if not, what do you think?

15 hours ago, Starman- said:

I was playing KSP1 earlier and got to thinking about it. In my opinion it would be great for fixing things on outposts (like in the current KSP), exploring and just all around immersion.  Have you guys heard anything and if not, what do you think? 

Yes. I posted one.
Hasn’t been mentioned, but I do agree it would be nice.

I've been doing exactly that for a while now in KSP1 using the ThroughThe Eyes mod, forum link and Spacedock links below. Good fun! NB: I am still playing version 1.9 of the game as my main game,  but will be switching to the current version when my current game ends.  (Devs; I'm really pleased with the performance  improvements I'm seeing over v1.9, thank you!)
